citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on 12-
MAY-21.
The inspector spoke to a household member who said the licensee was at work and unable to return home for inspection.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries.

The inspector spoke to a household member who said the licensee was at work and unable to return home for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
